library(rockchalk)

 A way of checking if a string is a valid file name.

#### Description

A copy from R's ``grDevices:::checkIntFormat`` because it is not exported there

#### Usage
<pre><code>
checkIntFormat(s)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments

* ``s`` An integer

#### Value
logical: TRUE or FALSE

#### Author(s)
R Core Development Team
